data.name: Rota Craze
data.detailed_description:
It's a fun game for the whole family. It starts out easy enough. But after a bit you realize it's getting harder. And before you know it, you are going crazy trying to keep up!
Who will get the highest score? Will you have the patience and focus to be the best? Soon you will realize why the game is called ROTA CRAZE!
data.about_the_game:
It's a fun game for the whole family. It starts out easy enough. But after a bit you realize it's getting harder. And before you know it, you are going crazy trying to keep up!
Who will get the highest score? Will you have the patience and focus to be the best? Soon you will realize why the game is called ROTA CRAZE!
data.short_description: Easy to learn and family-fun Rota Craze starts out easy enough. But before you know it, it's driving you nuts! As you progress you will need to think outside of the box and find a way to get through each level. Easy to learn, harder to master.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
